Go ahead, bring the little ones It's no surprise that the home of Fred Rogers is filled with family fun. The family attractions in our neighbohood make up KidsBURGH¬Æ, the ultimate destination for adventurers of all ages. Explore child-friendly museums where you'll travel to the Moon and Mars, tap into your creative side and stay active with hands-on exhibits. Then, head to the thrill of our theme parks, get up close to the animals at our zoo and aviary and cap it all off with a frozen treat. Please enable JavaScript to show the Partner Listings listings.
